description: [Siloscape](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0623) impersonates the main thread of CExecSvc.exe by calling NtImpersonateThread.(Citation: Unit 42 Siloscape Jun 2021)

external_references.description: Prizmant, D. (2021, June 7). Siloscape: First Known Malware Targeting Windows Containers to Compromise Cloud Environments. Retrieved June 9, 2021.
